content.text:
# Lords of Corswarem

The Lords of Corswarem are the heads of the noble house of Corswarem-Looz. The current Dukes of Corswarem are descendants of Lords of . The current Duke, Thierry is the 11th Duke of Corswarem-Looz.
See also separate article House of Looz-Corswarem.
List
Lords of Corswarem
Originally the Lords of Corswarem belong to a branch of the Lords and counts of Los. the first mentioned in the Supplement aux Trophees is Robert of Los, lord of Corswarem, married to Ida; Lady of Geneffe. He acted a foundation in  1247 in a foundation for Herckenrode Abbey. He participated to the Seventh Crusade of Louis IX of France with his three sons, and arrived in 1249 in Damiate.
Robert of Looz, Lord of Corswarem x Ida of Geneffe.

Counts of Looz-Corswarem and Holy Empire
Catherine of Looz-Corswarem x Jacques de Looz-Corswarem, son of Jean I de Corswarem x Isabeau de Ligne.
##François I, Count de Looz-Corswarem, (1551-1593) x Antoinette de Gulpen.
###Jean, Count de Looz-Corswarem, died 1657
###Erasme, Count de Looz-Corswarem x Marie de Binckem.
####Hubert, Count de Looz-Corswarem: became in 1652 1st Baron of Longchamp.
#####Jean-Hubert,  Count de Looz-Corswarem: see further.

##Jacques II died 1621 x Agnes de Byelandt
##Philipotte, married Philippe, Lord of Berlaymont.
Dukes of Corswarem-Looz
The ducal line is not had the possibility to continue straight from father to son, after the death of the 3rd Duke, another line had to be recognised by the crown. The descendants of François II continued the line of dukes. In the 17th century the dukes had large connection in the Holy Roman Empire, and no difficulties to find a bride of good house.
Jean Hubert, Count of Corswarem-Looz, 2nd Baron of Longchamps: married Marguerite-Claire de Ligny-Argenteau
##Nicolas-François, de Corswarem-Looz, 3rd Baron of Longchamps x Marie-Françoise de Trazignies: no heirs.
##Antoine-Hubert, Count of Corswarem-Looz: died without heirs.
## Louis-Félix, 1st Duke of Corswarem Looz:Married ''1st/ Hélène-Thérese de Spanghen d'Uyternesse,2nd/ Marie-Françoise d'assignies.
###Charles-Louis-August-Ferdinand-Emmanuel, 3rd Duke of Corswarem-Looz and Prince of Rheina-Wolbecq (1769-1822): Imperial Lord Chamberlain.x Princess of Prussia: No heirs.
###Charles-Alexandre-Auguste, Count of Corswarem-Looz: Lord Chamberlain of the Archduchess.
